description: This big bright truck is bringin’ Kansas City the best Asian Fusion cuisine to boot!Buu Gia (actually pronounced “Boo Yah”) was raised in Vietnam, amongst a family with a rich culinary background, and was fortunate enough to be surrounded by delicious traditional Vietnamese dishes from day one. When his family moved all the way to Kansas City when he was a child, he was then introduced to all the lovely local eats as well. As he grew and developed his own culinary instincts, he began to fuse the flavors of the Far East with the Midwest, and now he’s serving a mouthwatering mobile menu that is just the best. Beef Summer Sausage Fried Rice, Vietnamese Egg Rolls, Grilled Center Loin Pork Chop or Grilled Curry Chicken served with Asian Slaw….No matter what you order, the tasty food you get from Boo Yah will leave you and your tummy in absolute awe.
name: Boo Yah
